alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:02PM MST until December 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Rain mixing with snow this afternoon, changing to all snow by this evening. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Castle Rock, and Limon. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially after 5 pm. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
